comments.en:
2.25 inch wide label printer; driver by Mark Whitis
Tested OK by driver author on Manufacturer supplied printer. Just remember that most software expecting an 8-1/2x11 page (not a mailing label) will print in the UL corner of the page without proper configuration - adjust margins so it prints in the LL corner or adjust page size. Note that pbm2lwxl is not a ghostscript driver; it is a filter which takes PBM output from ghostscript and translates it for the filter.
